{"blocks":[{"key":"7t8i9","text":"Culture HEK 293 STF CRL-3249™  (from now own referred as HEK-STF) according to the company specifications (1) until confluent and not too many passages old.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":28,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f2n1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"av0if","text":"Seed 3 wells of HEK-STF cells per sample and following controls: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5amdm","text":"-negative control: conditioned media from L-cells (not transfected with luciferase construct) (4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qv67","text":"-positive control: previous batch with known activity, HEK-STF cells with recombinant Wnt-3a or agonist stimulation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fd3s","text":"-control lysates as blank for luminescence: HEK-SFT cells with HEK-medium only","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drlkf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcn0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"85rj4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"E2C48190EA6C11EDB3A48731D96EE747","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6488f","text":"Luiferase solution ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mc97","text":"Prepare on the day luciferase solution. Keep in the fridge until ready to use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dr1n","text":"When using a plate reader with automatic injection, calculate the extra volume needed for it (ca 3 mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e00b6","text":"fill to final volume with Assay reagent  solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m66e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30v69","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a62gl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"49cgn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100,100],"data":[["Reagent","units","[stock]","[working]"],["DTT ","M","1","0,033"],["CoA","mM","10","0,266"],["Luciferin","mM","20","0,467"],["ATP","mM","100","0,633"]],"guid":"EF44B730EA7311EDB3A48731D96EE747","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"u8rs","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagent","units","[stock]","[working]"],["DTT ","M","1","0,033"],["CoA","mM","10","0,266"],["Luciferin","mM","20","0,467"],["ATP","mM","100","0,633"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eju4q","text":"Cell lysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37si8","text":"Aspirate medium from HEK-STF cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2peta","text":"Add   /well of  1x Lysis buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9hnv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"66638BB0EA7011EDB3A48731D96EE747","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar6e3","text":"Leave the plate for   at  . (Note: pippeting seems to make cell aggregates and bubbles)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bh0jh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"620034C0EA7411EDB3A48731D96EE747","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"65FC8FB0EA7411EDB3A48731D96EE747","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"75tmo","text":"Check under the microscope that most cells are lysed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7hav","text":"Shake gently for   on plate shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bem55","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"6C225A50EA7411EDB3A48731D96EE747","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dr4gg","text":"Transfer    of each sample to a 96 well plate for luminescence read. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bg0q2","text":"Avoid bubbles or cell clumps. Recommended pipetting scheme as in the 24 well plate of HEK-STF culture-","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56gk9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"0BC74980EA7011EDB3A48731D96EE747","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cr99","text":"If using a plate reader without automatic injection:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erfio","text":"Take to the plate reader with luci. solution, multichanel pipette, and reagend reservoir","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ook3","text":"Once the plate reader is set, add    of luciferse solution per well and read.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fdjpd","text":"For accuracy, use a multichanel pipette and add the solution covering not one sample at a time but one of the triplcates of all samples at one time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"D42A3088EA7111EDB4840A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bo92h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e9sm","text":"(signal decreases ca. 20% in the first 10 minutes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8v3d","text":"Check that the relative luminescence units from negative controls are orders of magnitude lower that test samples. Average values from triplicates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bl0h0","text":"Values below more than 50-60% lower than a working batch of conditioned media are considered of poor quality.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2apkp","text":"Examples of equipment and methods: Berthold Tristar-GAS ISRE Luciferase Assay, SpectraMax i3x-SpectraMax Glo Steady-Luc Reporter Assay","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bnepg","text":"Prepare 1x Lysis medium from the stock with destiled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
